paper_abstract: The issue of how to provide location-based service (LBS) is attracted many researchers. In this paper, we focus on an useful searching type in LBS, forecasting search, which provides search result for a future time based on the current information of moving objects. To deal with such kind of searches, a PV-graph is proposed for analyzing the possible situations of the moving objects. By using PV-graph, forecasting queries in LBS applications can be responded efficiently.
paper_title: Forecasting region search of moving objects
